## PolicyContext interface

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Context provided to policies for context-aware classification.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface PolicyContext 
```

## Remarks

This allows policies to make decisions based on more than just the change category. For example, a policy might allow one breaking change per release but flag multiple breaking changes as requiring special approval.
